PLAYER_DELAY: Used for delay of spawing or removing birds. Seconds X 1000 = Delay(300,000 is 5Mins)
ANIMAL_DELAY: Used for delay of spawing or removing birds. Seconds X 1000 = Delay(300,000 is 5Mins)
DISABLE_BIRDS: 1=true/0=false :Used to disable birds from spawning at all over dead bodies Default:1
